LanguageData.DissectionNoPassion.stages.0.label: Desecrated a corpse
LanguageData.DissectionNoPassion.stages.0.description: I dismembered a human corpse - gross.
LanguageData.DissectionMinorPassion.stages.0.label: Dissected a human
LanguageData.DissectionMinorPassion.stages.0.descript: I dismembered a human corpse but the knowledge helps us to survive.
LanguageData.DissectionMajorPassion.stages.0.label: Learned about anatomy
LanguageData.DissectionMajorPassion.stages.0.descript: I dissected a corpse and learned about the human anatomy.
